text: Happy Friday! I'm working on creating a custom module that loops through a group and one of the field values I would like to use is the Page Selector, would anyone know what the value for returning just the url would be in hubl? Right now the snippet gives me `{{ page_by_id(module.field_group.service_page) }}` but I was hoping for just the url to return, currently nothing renders out
Unfortunately that didn't bring me back the url. Does that field have any dependencies that I might be missing for it to return values?
I just figured that out muself today
I narrowed it down to having the field group repeat with a page selector doesn't render the url...
